backend/main.mo: Implements a canister storing mantra data with types for Veda, languages, metadata, and translations, plus ordering logic and predefined Samaveda mantras 47 and 48.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence records mapping frontend files to requirements for loading mantra content and template fallback behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collects short descriptions of all frontend files, detailing their roles in data fetching, UI components, styling, scripts, and diagnostics.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Provides a step-by-step guide for deploying the app to Internet Computer mainnet with prerequisites and identity configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH-driven color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint bootstrapping the frontend React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style rule routing all requests to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA-safe 404 redirect page preserving the original path via query parameter for client-side route restoration.
frontend/README.md: High-level project overview describing app features, public URL usage, canister IDs, and development instructions.
frontend/scripts/build.sh: Script performing a clean rebuild by removing caches, regenerating bindings, installing dependencies, and building frontend and canisters.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Mainnet deployment script with safety prompts, canister ID output, and post-deployment verification steps for Samaveda mantras 47/48.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling routing, dropdown state, data fetching, deep-linking, content rendering, and template preview/editor flows.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsPanel: Displays backend diagnostics including counts and status flags with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Handles fetching, playing, and uploading mantra audio with authentication and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MantraContentTem: Manages loading, editing, validating, and submitting mantra content templates with copy and reset features.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Renders metadata text and highlights label tokens ending with a colon.
frontend/src/components/MantraTemplatePr: Shows a readâ€‘only preview of a mantra template inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/ShareArea.tsx: Displays the current URL and provides a copy-to-clipboard sharing control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching mantra numbers and mantra-related data (meaning, text, metadata) from the backend using an actor instance, with aggressive refetching and strict cache settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including custom OKLCH color tokens and metadata label styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up the React Query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the App component.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides utilities for validating select values and ensuring bigint selections are greater than zero.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, animations, and theme variables mapped to CSS custom properties.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues with mantra selection, and existing feature requirements related to displaying mantra content and template fallback behavior.
